Class TRules

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--TRules
Direct Known Subclasses:
THexagonQueensRules
public abstract class TRules
extends java.lang.Object

The rules are located only in the server. It is the rules that determines whether a hit is playable or not It returns a factory, allowing both the server and the client to instanciate a component that will create the game : the board, the entities, the players ...

isPlayable

public abstract boolean isPlayable(TBoard B,
